critique: At least one event was missed: she accidentally dropped the lemon into the cup and then used a spoon to take it out. She didn’t put the lemon into the cup on purpose — she only squeezed the lemon juice and poured the drink into one glass bottle, not glasses.

temporal.caption: A little girl is seated at a table in front of two glasses, a 7up bottle and a plate of lime slices.
She adds the soda and lime slices to the glasses, squeezing the juice into the liquid before taking a drink.

captions.full: A little girl is seated at a table in front of two glasses, a 7up bottle and a plate of lime slices. She adds the soda and lime slices to the glasses, squeezing the juice into the liquid before taking a drink.
